options.hide_filterinfo: @{type=boolean; description=Suppress filterspec and current filter info if 1 (true); default=0}
options.limit: @{type=int; description=Number of records to retrieve; default=100}
options.offset: @{type=int; description=Specifies the index of the first returned resource within the entire result set; default=0}
options.extended_fetch: @{type=boolean; description=Fetch entire resource if 1 (true), or resource link only if 0 (false); default=0}
options.link_disp_field: @{type=enum; description=When not using extended_fetch, this determines which field is used for the "description" of the resource link; default=main.company; values=System.Object[]}
